menu.name: All Natural Vegetarian Dishes
menu.description: No M-S-G, no cholesterol, no eggs, no preservations and alcohol free! (cooked with olive oil only). Q: What is in vegetarian chicken, vegetarian beef or vegetarian shrimp? A: Our vegetarian chicken, beef and shrimp consists of Chinese mushrooms, soybean, vegetables and seaweed. There is no chicken, beef or shrimp.

review.review_text: Best lomein in America. Have traveled around and this is by far some of the best Chinese
Very disappointed in the food. The salt & pepper shrimp were gross... $1.50 per scoop down by Havana salt & pepper shrimp were 10 times bett...
Worst in Aurora. Food was absolutely awful. Seemed like everything was microwaved and very little effort was obvious in every dish I tried. ...
HORRIBLE!. The food was old and chewy, when I asked the manager to fix the problem he told me I just dont like Chinese food and next time I ...
Really Bad Experience. Ordered take out to our dismay, lo mien fell out on plate in a gooey clump! Tasted it and spit it out!!!!!!! Like old...
